title: List the object keys by key prefix

value.name: projectId
value.helpTip: The id of Google Cloud project.

value.name: bucket
value.helpTip: The name of the bucket. This doesn't include the sub-directory directory.

value.name: objectKeyPrefix
value.helpTip: The prefix of the object key. This does not include the bucket name. Example: /invoice/2024/03
